name: Drag Taxi PRO
description:
The taxi game of the year is here! How far can you go?! How fast can you go?! Drag on and find out! How long can you go stay in this taxi? Ride this taxi and find out!
- No In App Purchases
- No ADS
- No internet connection needed to play
- Figure out to move taxi
- Pure Game
- Enjoy
